Input File.Polygon_file_COMMENT: Select your boundary area file. '.kml' and '.shp' accepted.

Output.Output_folder_COMMENT: An output package will be created in this folder. Leave empty for output to be created next to the input Polygon file.
Output.Convert_to_specific_UTM_Zone_COMMENT: leave as '0' to auto detect UTM_Zone
Output.Open_KML_files_when_complete_COMMENT: This will open all the created kml files in their default app (e.g. Google earth pro)

Flight Line Parameters.flight_line_angle_COMMENT: degrees CW of North, (tie line angle set automatically to flight_line_angle + 90 degrees)

Tie Line Parameters.tie_line_spacing_COMMENT: meters, set to '0' to not create tie lines

Tie Line Buffering Parameters.flight_line_overshoot_after_intersection: this value (in meters) indicates how far the flight lines should extend past the tie lines.

Parameters that apply to all lines.anchor_coordinates_COMMENT: set to '0' to auto-generate. If anchor shifts from previous iteration it can be set manually here. Format: X,Y
Parameters that apply to all lines.merge_gaps_smaller_than_COMMENT: meters, this is the size of the gap bewtween lines that will be merged. set to '0' disable
Parameters that apply to all lines.delete_lines_smaller_than_COMMENT: meters, set to '0' to not delete any lines

Output Sensor Type_RADIO.Mag_COMMENT: This will NOT output swaths. It will append '_MAG' to the output package.
Output Sensor Type_RADIO.Lidar_COMMENT: This will output swaths. It will append '_LIDAR' to the output package.
Output Sensor Type_RADIO.Ortho_COMMENT: This will output swaths. It will append '_ORTHO' to the output package.
Output Sensor Type_RADIO.None_COMMENT: This will output swaths. It will not append anything to the output package.

Swath Settings.swath_width_COMMENT: The width of the rectangles that are placed around the output lines
